node.detail_zh: 患者為第 #64 宗個案患者的妻子，二人有長期病患，居於小西灣邨瑞滿樓，於 2 月 12 日出現咳嗽， 2 月 18 日因持續咳嗽向私家醫生求診，之後到東區尤德夫人那打素醫院並入院接受治療。他們的呼吸道樣本證實對新型冠狀病毒呈陽性反應，現時情況穩定。他們於潛伏期內沒有外遊，其同住的女兒沒有出現病徵，將被安排接受檢疫。
node.detail_en: Patients no. 65 and no. 64 are a married couple who live in Sui Moon House, Siu Sai Wan Estate. Both of them have chronic illnesses. They started coughing since Feb 12 and sought treatment from a private clinic. They visited the private clinic again on Feb 18 and were then admitted to Pamela Youde Nethersole Eastern Hospital due to persistent coughing. Subsequently, they tested positive for coronavirus. They are now in a stable condition. They had no travel history during the incubation period. Their daughter who lives with the couple has not shown any symptoms but has been put in quarantine.
node.classification_zh: 可能本地個案的密切接觸者

groups.description_zh: 「福慧精舍」佛堂位於北角美輪大廈，相關患者包括佛堂工作人員及善信。「福慧精舍」是本港第三宗超級傳播事件。福群組患者中，最早病發日期是 2 月 8 日。
groups.description_en: "Fook Wai Ching She" is a Buddhist preaching hall located in Maylun Apartments, North Point. Related infected patients include staff members and followers. This is the third case of super-spreader. The case was first discovered on Feb 8.

node.location_zh: LongChamp 中環 ifc 分店

node.location_en: Sui Moon House, Siu Sai Wan Estate
node.remarks_zh: 與丈夫 ( 第64 宗患者 ) 及女兒同住 ，於 2 月 12 日出現咳嗽
